ygData.subject: SK Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, been perusing the e-mails.  Looks like a change to the magic system isn t going to be happening any time soon because there doesn t seem to be consensus
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, been perusing the e-mails. Looks like a change to the magic system
isn't going to be happening any time soon because there doesn't seem to be
consensus within the SK community as to which spells suck and which don't
:-)

So to help out human and DE SKs, what about a shield/1HS combo acquirable
around 25th or 30th level through questing that gives you a significant
amount of protection (to make up for lack of HP compared to Ogre/SK) and
damage (think of an Anti-Ghoulbane)?

And for you troll/ogre SKs, there are other goodies going in for you too :-)

Brian
